CTRL-K
Coins Categories List (ID Map)
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/categories/list

This endpoint allows you to query all the coins categories on CoinGecko

üëç

Tips

You may use this endpoint to query the list of categories for other endpoints that contain params like category.
üìò

Notes

CoinGecko Equivalent Page: https://www.coingecko.com/en/categories.
Cache / Update Frequency: every 5 minutes for all the API plans.
CoinGecko categories are different from GeckoTerminal categories.
RESPONSE
200

List all categories

RESPONSE BODY
object
category_id
string

category ID

name
string

category name

Updated about 1 month ago

üëë Token Lists by Asset Platform ID
Coins Categories List with Market Data
Did this page help you?
Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP
Python
CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/categories/list \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200
EXAMPLE
1
[
2
  {
3
    "category_id": "aave-tokens",
4
    "name": "Aave Tokens"
5
  },
6
  {
7
    "category_id": "aaccount-abstraction",
8
    "name": "Account Abstraction"
9
  }
10
]
